bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of zheng 癥 , concretions-illness, which forms when lice crushed with one’s teeth and swallowed in excessive quantities collect in the organs without being digested. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 19: 虱癥候：人有多虱而性好嚙之，所嚙既多， 腑臟虛弱，不能消之，不幸變化生癥，而患者亦少 , “The signs of lice concretion - illness : When someone has many lice and prefers to chew them, and if those chewed are too many, in case the depots and palaces are depleted and weak and are unable to dissolve them, it may be that they are transformed into concretion-illness. However, not many suffer from this”.
